frontmatter.title: Introducing the Sword of the Spirit
frontmatter.description: What is the the Sword of the Spirit. It's the Word of God. It's your weapon against the enemy. It's sharper than any double-edged sword!

frontmatter.title: True meaning of Christmas
frontmatter.description: What is Christmas about? Why do we celebrate it? These are all some great questions. Let's take a look at the true meaning of Christmas

frontmatter.title: Latest Updates!
frontmatter.description: It's been awhile since you guys have heard from me. Some of you may be wondering what happened to me?

frontmatter.title: Happy Thanksgiving
frontmatter.description: We can give thanks to God in all times in life. God deserves all our praise

frontmatter.title: Gifts of the Holy Spirit
frontmatter.description: Did you know that when you accept the free gift of salvation that you receive the Holy Spirit. It is the goal of the Holy Spirit to transform you to become like Jesus through a process that is called sanctification. Let's look at one way the Holy Spirit does this. Which, is through spiritual gifts

verses.overrideVerse: [23] But the hour is coming, and is now here, when the true worshipers will worship the Father in spirit and truth, for the Father is seeking such people to worship him. [24] God is spirit, and those who worship him must worship in spirit and truth.” (ESV)

[9] All the nations you have made shall come
        and worship before you, O Lord,
        and shall glorify your name. (ESV)

[6] Oh come, let us worship and bow down;
        let us kneel before the LORD, our Maker! (ESV)

[8] And Jesus answered him, “It is written,

    “‘You shall worship the Lord your God,
        and him only shall you serve.’” (ESV)
[1] I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship. (ESV)
[3] For we are the circumcision, who worship by the Spirit of God and glory in Christ Jesus and put no confidence in the flesh— (ESV)

frontmatter.title: The Worshipping Church
frontmatter.description: Did you know that God created you to worship Him? Everything we do as a church is an act of worship. Let's take a look at how we are to worship God.
